Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class UpdateListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<Update>
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.UpdateListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectListener, java.lang.Runnable
public class UpdateListener
extends Observable<Update>
implements ObjectListener, java.lang.Runnable
This class implements the capability of listen asynchronously the client-server stream to catch Update objects sent from server to client. Composition-over-inheritance principle is applied to let this class extend Observable (the View must observe an instance of this class in order to handle updates and notify the users about the game state), but also share code with CommandListener.
See Also:
ObjectListenerDelegate

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      This method is useful to check if the communication between client and server is still in progress.
      Specified by:
      isActive in interface ObjectListener
      Returns:
      true if the socket is still open, false otherwise.

      Parameters:

    • run

      public void run()
      Classic overridden version of run method (from Runnable interface). Note that the channel is listen on a separate thread (the new Thread is launched at application startup).
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • forwardNotify

      public void forwardNotify​(java.lang.Object update)
      Forwards notiy messages from ObjectListenerDelegate to the View
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • handleConnectionTimeoutExpired

      public void handleConnectionTimeoutExpired() throws java.io.IOException
      Callback called when the timeout for socket read is expired. If setIsActive(false) was called, close the relative socket.
      Specified by:
      handleConnectionTimeoutExpired in interface ObjectListener
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if socket.close() encounters an error.

    • handleConnectionReset

      public void handleConnectionReset()
      Callback called when the communication between client and server is interrupted. It notifies the View, which shows an error message to the user.
      Specified by:
      handleConnectionReset in interface ObjectListener
